items.sentence: Tom and I were wondering if you\'d like to join us.
I wouldn\'t waste any more time trying to fix that.
The last thing I want to do is cause you a problem.
The problem was I didn\'t know Tom was dating Mary.
Tom began to really enjoy jogging after a few days.
Are you going to do anything special for Christmas?
When was the last time you spent any time with Tom?
All the buildings on this block will be demolished.
I came up to Boston from Nashville a few years ago.
I can come over to help, but not this Monday night.
